研究估计孕妇丙型肝炎感染血清流行率研究人员估计了全球和世界卫生组织特定区域孕妇中丙型肝炎病毒的血清流行率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-estimates-hepatitis-C-infection-seroprevalence-in-pregnant-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-estimates-hepatitis-C-infection-seroprevalence-in-pregnant-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=631117fc-0298-40fd-bf53-2d66740794d8 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 11:31:00 -0500 Study estimates hepatitis C infection seroprevalence in pregnant women
浏览影响者景观：社交媒体影响者对青少年的积极和消极影响研究人员评估了之前关于社交媒体影响者对青少年健康影响的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Navigating-the-influencer-landscape-The-positive-and-male-effects-of-social-media-influencers-on-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Navigating-the-influencer-landscape-The-positive-and-male-effects-of-social-media-influencers-on-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c349380-741d-4ed0-bd60-e02613281195 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 11:23:00 -0500 Navigating the influencer landscape: The positive and negative effects of social media influencers on adolescents
研究发现，在轻度至中度 COVID-19 门诊患者中，氟伏沙明治疗并不能缩短症状持续时间研究人员调查了高剂量氟伏沙明对轻至中度 COVID-19 患者的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-finds-among-out Patients-with-mild-to-moderate-COVID-19-treatment-with-fluvoxamine-does-not-reduce-duration-症状.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-finds-among-out Patients-with-mild-to-moderate-COVID-19-treatment-with-fluvoxamine-does-not-reduce-duration- of-symtoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa3d4bf4-2e29-4692-bf8e-ff35df381113 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 11:15:00 -0500 Study finds among outpatients with mild to moderate COVID-19, treatment with fluvoxamine does not reduce duration of symptoms

一种健康，一种使命：抗微生物药物耐药性前线的世界动物卫生组织对德尔菲·戈切斯博士的采访。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/One-Health-One-Mission-The-World-Organization-for-Animal-Health-on-the-AMR-Frontline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/One-Health-One-Mission-The-World-Organization-for-Animal-Health-on-the-AMR-Frontline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fdd9e4d-105d-410f-98fc-018bd7623c37 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 09:58:00 -0500 One Health, One Mission: The World Organisation for Animal Health on the AMR Frontline
研究人员发现印迹细胞的记忆存储机制让我们的大脑吸收有关世界的新信息并形成记忆的机制是什么？都柏林三一学院的 Tomás Ryan 博士领导的神经科学家团队的新研究表明，学习是通过大脑不同区域的特定印迹细胞之间不断形成新的连接模式而发生的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Researchers-discover-mechanism-for-memory-storage-in-engram-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b157a239-3424-4857-a362-121cf2a1a196 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:34:49 -0500 Researchers discover mechanism for memory storage in engram cells
研究表明膳食氨基酸摄入量高与 2 型糖尿病风险增加有关膳食氨基酸摄入量与 2 型糖尿病发病率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-links-high-dietary-amino-acid-intake-to-increased-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Study-links-high-dietary-amino-acid-intake-to-increased-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8e016e2-3eb9-49a1-b286-529ce38a4da0 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:25:00 -0500 Study links high dietary amino acid intake to increased type 2 diabetes risk
吃更多的超加工食品可能会增加患上呼吸消化道癌症的风险布里斯托大学和国际机构的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，吃更多的超加工食品（UPF）可能会增加患上呼吸消化道（包括口腔、喉咙和食道）癌症的风险癌症研究 (IARC)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Eating-more-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-risk-of-upper-aerodigestive-tract-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Eating-more-ultra-processed-foods-may-increase-risk-of-upper-aerodigestive-tract-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44dceb11-2ad2-4421-8f10-013d49b8381b Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:22:42 -0500 Eating more ultra-processed foods may increase risk of upper aerodigestive tract cancers
老年人的粮食不安全是否与随后较高的痴呆风险和记忆力下降有关？目前发表在《美国医学会杂志》网络公开版上的研究试图利用纵向数据并补偿生命过程中可能变化的其他变量来确定粮食不安全和痴呆症之间是否存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Is-food-insecurity-among-older-adults- Associated-with-higher-subsequent-dementia-risk-and-memory-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231122/Is-food-insecurity-among-older-adults- Associated-with-higher-subsequent-dementia-risk-and-memory-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4fbf892d-809c-4243-aba5-16438361d4f1 Wed, 22 Nov 2023 08:21:00 -0500 Is food insecurity among older adults associated with higher subsequent dementia risk and memory decline?
